meanings.definition: In a way that is easily noticeable or widely recognized.
meanings.sent1: The bright red sign was prominently displayed outside the store.
meanings.sent2: The tall lighthouse stood prominently on the rocky cliff.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was prominently perched on top of the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out prominently in the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The golden trophy gleamed prominently on the winner's shelf.

meanings.definition: In a way that stands out or is easily seen.
meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers were prominently arranged in the vase.
meanings.sent2: The bold headline was prominently displayed on the front page.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was prominently perched on top of the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed prominently in the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign stood out prominently against the dark sky.

meanings.definition: In a way that is important or influential.
meanings.sent1: The CEO's decision was prominently featured in the company newsletter.
meanings.sent2: The historical figure was prominently mentioned in the textbook.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was prominently perched on top of the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her advice resonated prominently with the team members.
meanings.sent5: The symbol of peace was prominently displayed at the event.
